name: ZodiacColorRoles
author: Taako
description: Comprehensive role management system for zodiac signs, colors, pronouns, and ping preferences. Supports both slash commands and prefix commands with bulk creation options.
install_msg: Thank you for installing the ZodiacColorRoles cog! Use `[p]help ZodiacColorRoles` to see all available commands. Supports both slash commands and prefix commands for maximum flexibility.
short: Advanced role creation system for zodiac, color, pronoun, and ping roles.
end_user_data_statement: This cog does not persistently store or share any end user data.
